Text: Enron Engineering Opportunitiesafternoon Phillip My name is Scott Schaunaman We spoke yesterday regarding engineering opportunities at Enron I am currently seeking a position as a juniorproject engineer My background is in gas pipeline simulation and design as well as miscellaneous project management for pipeline terminals I currently work at Fluor Daniel in Pipeline Engineering I am seeking a position with an operating company as a juniorproject engineer with responsibilities in project cost scheduling engineering safety environmental and construction supervision for pipeline projects If you are aware of any such opportunity I would be interested in pursuing a career with Enron Please see the attached resume for more details regarding my qualifications If you have any questions or require additional information please feel free to contact me via email or at Thanks for your time and consideration and I look forward to hearing back from you Sincerely Scott Schaunaman PS Great game last night I was getting concerned about losing our first game on our new turf The last innings were great Have a good one Do You Yahoo Talk to your friends online with Yahoo Messenger SASdoc
